text: Nandao nimen shuoguo “yi bo la xin, yi sima yi, yi si ha ge, ye er gu bai he ge zi pai, dou shi youtai jiaotu, huo jidu jiaotu ma?” Ni shuo:“Nimen geng you zhishi ne? Haishi an la geng you zhishi ne? Ziji shouzhong you cong an la jiang shi de zhengju, er jiayi yinhui de ren, you shei bi ta hai bu yi ne? An la jue bu hushi nimen de xingwei.”
